<h2>A few words about me</h2>
<p class="about-text left-align">My name is Christiana Andreou.</p></br>
<p class="about-text space-after">I graduated in 2017 from Agios Nikolaos High School in Limassol, Cyprus. From 2017 to 2021, I pursued my Bachelor's degree at the Cyprus University of Technology in the Department of Communication and Internet Studies. In 2024, I started a new Master’s program at the Cyprus University of Technology, which has just been introduced. The program is titled Experiential Digital Marketing.</p>
<p class="about-text space-after">Find me at <a href="https://github.com/ChristianaAndreou/" target="_blank">GitHub</a> or send me an email chra.andreou@edu.cut.ac.cy </p>
